tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently underwent a root canal+ dental crown treatment with Dr. Mohit, and I had a very good experience.

The procedure was executed with minimal pain and gentle approach. Also Dr. Mohit was very approachable and took the time to explain every aspect of the procedure in detail. His transparency and thoroughness in addressing my concerns and clearing all my doubts and apprehensions made me at ease throughout the treatment. I also had flexibility with appointment timings according to my schedule which made the entire process much smoother. 
I highly recommend Dr. Mohit for anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

review: I came from Rajasthan to Mumbai and there was some issue with my implant, the healing abutment popped out. There was some infection and inflammation over there. The doctor and my doctor from the home town connected together and resolved the issue also he kept on explaining the issue so that I don't feel worried about and all this with minimal chargers - I thought doing minor surgery in Mumbai will cost me a lot but that wasn't the case here.

Had a amazing experience with him 
Very good doctor 
He understand the patient first & makes u comfortable

I went to Dr Mohit Solanki after reading the reviews on practo, and I am extremely satisfied and happy with my treatment till now. The reasons are as below - 
The consultation was very comprehensive and everything was explained in detail. Only absolutely necessary procedures were recommended. 
Charges are explained beforehand, they are very transparent and there is absolutely no hidden cost. The procedures cost minimal and is a bargain. 
the clinic is very clean and doctor is very patient. While doing the procedure, he explains what is being done. 
All in all, am thoroughly satisfied and would definitely recommend the doctor to everyone.
reply_text:
Thank you for appreciating our work...
It inspires us to work harder!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would highly recommend the services of Dr. Mohit. He's very professional in his practice, and is friendly to his patients. I had consulted and received treatment from him for a root canal, filling, and cap placement. He was very careful to explain the process in detail while even illustrating the root of the problem. He ensures the patient is comfortable and emphasises that no extra cost will be added in the process without patient consent if a further procedure is required. Now, after the process I no longer have the extreme pain I was dealing with earlier, am 100% satisfied with the result, and even the cap fitting doesn't look artificial so it's hard to make out I've undergone a treatment. great service at affordable rates compared to other dentists!

review: Dr. Mohit is very practical and knowledgeable. He helps us understand the problems first with our teeth and then suggests the right approach.

Used to eat 20 packets of tobacco a day!
Visited Dr mohit navkar dental care and he thoroughly explained me all the harmful effects of my habit
We started with my cleaning sessions as there were really tough stains
It took 2 sessions to get completely cleaned,unlike any other dentist who would have taken 3-4 sessions to make more money
Dr mohit is highly professional and understands patient problem very well
Since a week now I have stopped my habit and this is all because of Dr mohit
Thank you sir

review:
Right mix of professional and personal touch. Very good counseling before and during treatment. Constant guidance on possible sensory experiences, in different stages of treatment, during treatment helps alleviate anxiety and cope better with pain. His carefully calibrated warmth is a lesson for medical  professionals, just the right dosage.

Just a suggestion, can make the clinic also bit peppier like his right warmth and also the staff can also be bit alive than being just robotic in their interaction.

Happy to take chance with his clinic and now I'm permanent with him. God bless, all the best.

Love

Amar

review:
Have got my re root canal at navkar dental care and I must say Dr mohit is really good 
Was having boil since four years and constant discomfort was there
Visited Dr mohit clinic and he advised me to go for re root canal !!
And I was planing for extraction but his confidence forced me to go with Dr mohit treatment plan
In 1 st sitting canals were re cleaned and he kept some dressing and asked me to come after 10 days !
To my surprise boil was completely gone and there was no discomfort! Still we waited for some more time and Dr mohit made sure everything goes perfect
Now I have got my cap done and everything is absolutely fine
Will definitely recommend to all my friends

Better would suggest for friends and relatives he has explained me completely in detail .good optionsalso given with better price 
Over all experience was great..................

Dr mohit is very humble and friendly 
Root canal was done properly without any discomfort!!
Treatment was very effective
Nicely done

Very happy with the result

reply_text:
Local infiltration anaesthesia is given in all implant cases..general anaesthesia is not possible in clinical set up and no one gives that for implant placement.
We try our best to make implant procedures painless sometimes it also depend on patient threshold ..
In your case Entire procedure was painless while implant placement it is natural to feel bone drill for some seconds as it is placed inside the bone‚Ä¶
Also few months back you have given us a review on how your rootcanal procedure was completely painless at our clinic..
